Package gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc

Class CompressedTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nasa.gsfc.spdf.ssc.CompressedTime
  • public class CompressedTime
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents the "COMPRESSED_TIME" datatype used by some of the SSC software. Refer to SSC documentation for more information about the datatype. The following description (taked from SSC software comments) is the definition from which this implementation was based. time is represented using a 32-bit unsigned integer according to the following encoding: 25 (year-1956)*2 + seconds where 1956≤ year ≤2083 year uses the uppermost 7 bits and seconds uses the lower 25 bits.
    Author:
    B. Harris
